title: Processing Step
description: Describes a single step within a signal processing pipeline.

stepId.description: Unique identifier for this step within the pipeline (e.g., "1", "2a", "filter_step"). Used in dependsOn.

name.description: Human-readable name for the processing step.

description.description: Detailed description of what this specific step does.

parameters.description: Key-value pairs detailing the parameters used for this step. Values can be strings, numbers, booleans, arrays, or nested objects.

inputSources.description: List of data sources used as input for this step.

outputTargets.description: List of data targets produced by this step.

dependsOn.description: An array of stepId strings from previous steps that must be completed before this step can run.

executionDateTime.description: The specific date and time this step was executed (ISO 8601 format).
